title: dom5684
author: dom5684
content: Good dayWould anybody be so kind as to guide me on how to reconnect my node to my electrum wallet. It was working before; I was connected to my personal node only, and was validating only my transactions. I have redownloaded and verified electrum and reflashed the sdcard with the myNode image but to no avail. On the myNode interface my electrum server keeps saying "compressing".Thank you for your time

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Are there any logs available with your my ode instance? I'm not familiar with running electrum servers but it might help someone who is if you have any extra information. Is your node fully synced with the blockchain too?

comments.author: dom5684
comments.body: Yes logs are available and my node is fully synced with the blockchain.

comments.author: nc50lc
comments.body: Quote from: dom5684 on November 13, 2022, 04:23:32 PMYes logs are available -snip-I think jackg is asking you to post the logs so people can analyze it in order to find the cause of the issue...You can remove the sensitive parts if necessary.

comments.author: dom5684
comments.body: Quote from: jackg on November 11, 2022, 07:59:59 PMAre there any logs available with your my ode instance? I'm not familiar with running electrum servers but it might help someone who is if you have any extra information. Is your node fully synced with the blockchain too? I cleared my electrum wallet certificates and it worked. I had tried this before and it didn't fix the problem, but this time around it did the job.Thank you
